name: Bob's Neighbor vs Zombie
description: Hi, friend! This free game is a zombie survival shooter. The evil thief Plankton set up a real zombie apocalypse in Bikini Bottom. In pursuit of the formula, he wanted to clone the citizens of the underworld city, but received bloodthirsty zombies. The new noisy neighbors smashed everything around. Neighbor and brave friend of spongebob Patrick managed to survive this nightmare. Now he needs to save the squarepants, but for this he needs to get out of the city alive. Help him in this difficult task. Use guns that shoot burgers, pineapples and sauces. Give these zombies a cooking frenzy. Kill them all and save Bob!
